mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, description, created_at, updated_at FROM articlemaster

SELECT A.seq, A.master_seq, (select AA.title from articlemaster AA where AA.seq = A.master_seq) as master_title, A.title, A.content, A.user_seq, A.view_count, IFNULL((select SUM(IF(AA.is_up, 1, -1)) from likes AA where AA.mode = 'article' and AA.content_seq = A.seq), 0) as likes, A.created_at, A.updated_at, IFNULL(B.nickname, '탈퇴유저') as nickname, B.photo, (select count(*) from comment AA where AA.article_seq = A.seq and AA.is_delete = false) as comment_count
, IFNULL((select true from scrap AA where AA.article_seq = A.seq and AA.user_seq = #{user_seq}), false) as scrap
from article A LEFT JOIN users B ON A.user_seq = B.seq
is_delete = false
AND A.seq = #{seq}
AND A.master_seq = #{master_seq}
AND (A.title like '%${search}%' or A.content like '%${search}%')
ORDER BY A.seq DESC
ORDER BY A.seq ASC
ORDER BY IFNULL((select SUM(IF(AA.is_up, 1, -1)) from likes AA where AA.mode = 'article' and AA.content_seq = A.seq), 0) DESC
ORDER BY (select count(*) from comment AA where AA.article_seq = A.seq and AA.is_delete = false) DESC
ORDER BY A.view_count DESC
LIMIT #{viewPageCnt} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article ( master_seq, title, content, user_seq ) VALUES ( #{master_seq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{user_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( article_seq, parent_comment_seq, content, user_seq ) values ( #{article_seq}, #{parent_comment_seq}, #{content}, #{user_seq} )
mapper.update: update article set is_delete = true where seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likes ( mode, content_seq, user_seq, is_up ) VALUES ( #{mode}, #{content_seq}, #{user_seq}, #{is_up} )
